title: cv_bridge exception when using any vehicle with depth camera (RGBD)

content.raw:
We are currently getting the following error anytime we launch a vehicle with an RGBD camera \(streams by repeatedly and never stops\):

‌

\[ERROR\] \[1584997556.953807928, 13.204000000\]: Compressed Image Transport - JPEG compression requires 8/16-bit color format \(input format is: 32FC1\)  
\[ERROR\] \[1584997556.954008727, 13.204000000\]: cv\_bridge exception: '\[32FC1\] is not a color format. but \[bgr8\] is. The conversion does not make sense'

‌

I am running the latest checkout from the default branch \(I also tried the latest urban\_circuit branch, same thing\).  Here is what I’m running to reproduce the error:

ign launch -v 4 tunnel\_circuit\_practice.ign worldName:=simple\_tunnel\_01 robotName1:=A1 robotConfig1:=costar\_husky\_sensor\_config\_1 localModel:=true
content.html:
We are currently getting the following error anytime we launch a vehicle with an RGBD camera (streams by repeatedly and never stops):

‌

[ERROR] [1584997556.953807928, 13.204000000]: Compressed Image Transport - JPEG compression requires 8/16-bit color format (input format is: 32FC1)
[ERROR] [1584997556.954008727, 13.204000000]: cv_bridge exception: '[32FC1] is not a color format. but [bgr8] is. The conversion does not make sense'

‌

I am running the latest checkout from the default branch (I also tried the latest urban_circuit branch, same thing). Here is what I’m running to reproduce the error:

ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=simple_tunnel_01 robotName1:=A1 robotConfig1:=costar_husky_sensor_config_1 localModel:=true
